translation.fr: On est pas en sécurité, ici.

translation.en: Take a breath. Tell me what happened.
translation.fr: Respire et dis-moi ce qu'il s'est passé.

translation.en: He's dangerous. Who?
Adam. I'm telling you. What? Did something happen?
translation.fr: Adam. Je le sens. Il s'est passé quelque chose ?

translation.en: Last night, he said...
And I saw... He had a...
translation.fr: Et j'ai vu... Il avait un...

translation.en: I just really think we need to go.
translation.fr: Je crois vraiment qu'il faut qu'on parte.

translation.en: I just really think we should go.
Honestly, Lily, you are going through a lot right now.
translation.fr: Tu sais, tu traverses une période difficile.

translation.en: Let us go somewhere new. Huh? Let's just take a road trip, just take a weekend,
translation.fr: Partons à l'aventure. En voiture, un week-end.

translation.en: just the two of us, somewhere cool, somewhere fun.
translation.fr: Toutes les deux. Dans un endroit cool, un endroit sympa.

translation.en: That could be good, right?
translation.fr: Ça nous fera du bien, hein ?

translation.en: We just need to make it through the funeral.
Then I'll make it right.
translation.fr: ensuite je ferai ce qu'il faut.

translation.en: There's gotta be something here that proves it.
translation.fr: Y a forcément une preuve quelque part.

translation.en: You ready?
Lily, we gotta go.
What the hell is this?
Where did you find that?
You never told me?
It's complicated. No, it's really not.
It's, like, a simple conversation that should have happened a long time ago.
translation.fr: C'est une conversation simple qu'on aurait dû avoir il y a longtemps.

translation.en: No. You don't-- Hold on. Hold on. No.
Don't touch me!
What?
Say it!
It wasn't entirely up to me.
translation.fr: Ça ne dépendait pas que de moi.

translation.en: Oh, really? Who else would it have been up to, Mom?
translation.fr: Ah bon ? Ça dépendait de qui d'autre, maman ?

translation.en: It was your birth mother.
It was the one condition that she had,
that I never reveal to you, and she's...
translation.fr: Que je ne te révèle jamais qu'elle...

translation.en: She didn't want you to know that you were adopted,
translation.fr: Elle ne voulait pas que tu saches que tu avais été adoptée,

translation.en: and I made a promise to her and...
translation.fr: et je le lui ai promis.

translation.en: It was such a...
God, it was a complicated...
Why would she want that? 'Cause she...
translation.fr: Pourquoi elle aurait demandé un truc pareil ?

translation.en: She had undergone some trauma.
I was assigned to her at the crisis center here and...
translation.fr: On me l'avait confiée au centre d'aide aux victimes, ici.

translation.en: Baby, I'm so sorry.
translation.fr: Ma puce, je te demande pardon.

translation.en: You guys, I need to talk to you.
translation.fr: Les filles, faut que je vous parle.

translation.en: I don't think that's a good idea.
Listen to me. Please.
There's no one else I can trust.
Fine.
You all right?
I need to take her away from here.
I need to put her first.
LOURDES: You guys, she's not gonna harm anyone.
translation.fr: Elle fera de mal à personne.

translation.en: She already did.
She's just going through some shit.
translation.fr: Elle traverse juste une sale période.

translation.en: Yeah, well, what happened to our number one rule of the craft?
translation.fr: Et que fait-on de notre première règle en sorcellerie ?

translation.en: If a person is a danger to herself or others,
translation.fr: Si on devient un danger pour soi ou pour les autres,

translation.en: they will be bound.
She used her powers irresponsibly.
translation.fr: Elle a utilisé ses pouvoirs de manière irresponsable.

translation.en: End of story.
But, like, are we any better, though?
I mean, like, what we did to Timmy.
translation.fr: Ce qu'on a fait à Timmy,

translation.en: That wasn't consensual either.
Well, then maybe we should bind ourselves too.
translation.fr: Alors, on neutralise aussi nos pouvoirs.

translation.en: We are bound to each other
translation.fr: Ce lien nous enchaîne les unes aux autres,

translation.en: and bound from magick.
translation.fr: et nous empêche d'utiliser la magie.

translation.en: We prevent ourselves from doing harm.
translation.fr: Nous nous empêchons de faire le mal.

translation.en: We relinquish our powers from this day forth.
translation.fr: Nous renonçons désormais à nos pouvoirs.

translation.en: ALL: So mote it be.
Let's go.
What?
You were right.
I never should've brought you here.
But I need you to agree to one thing.
Whatever this is, whatever's happening here...
translation.fr: Ce qui se passe en ce moment, peu importe ce que c'est,

translation.en: I need you to stop it.
What do you mean?
I should've told you.
Not just about your birth mother, but about...
translation.fr: Pas seulement de ta mère biologique,

translation.en: About these...
These powers.
Whatever you call them, Lily, they're-- You knew?
translation.fr: - Peu importe comment tu les appelles... - Tu savais ?

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I was warned...
that your legacy was a curse.
translation.fr: que tu avais hérité d'un don maléfique.

translation.en: And that the second they came online, I would have to stop them in their tracks, so Lily--
translation.fr: Dès les premières manifestations, je devais agir.

translation.en: Lily, please.
let me take the burden for you.
Let me take your curse so you don't have to carry it.
translation.fr: Laisse-moi prendre ta malédiction pour que tu n'aies plus à la subir.

translation.en: It has been so painful, you can't imagine...
translation.fr: Ça a été tellement douloureux, tu n'as pas idée.

translation.en: to watch you understand that you were different and not know why.
translation.fr: Te voir te débattre avec ta différence sans la comprendre.

translation.en: Now you can see why your difference...
translation.fr: Maintenant, tu sais pourquoi ta différence...

translation.en: is dangerous.
But I need you to say it with me, Lily.
In the name of Manon...
I give you my power.
You can trust me.
I'm your mother.
My mother would never tell me my difference is dangerous.
translation.fr: Ma mère dirait jamais que ma différence est dangereuse.

translation.en: Guys?
He...
killed...
me.
You guys.
Who is it?
LOURDES: T...
Those don't seem to be working anymore.
translation.fr: Toi, tu as perdu tes pouvoirs.

translation.en: Thanks to your so- called friends.
You see, that's the thing about girls with power, Lily.
translation.fr: C'est le problème des femmes qui ont du pouvoir.

translation.en: They're always too weak not to use it against each other.
translation.fr: Elles s'en servent les unes contre les autres.

translation.en: What do you want from me?
That's an excellent question.
Oh, you see, Lily....
I want your power.
Where's my mother?
Which one?
She's tied up at the moment.
Your real mom....
Well, she's tied up too, in a different way.
translation.fr: elle a aussi eu un empêchement, mais pas de même nature.

translation.en: You're a lot like her.
You know, she fought it at first,
but eventually she gave in.
translation.fr: Mais elle a fini par céder.

translation.en: You see, Lily, in order to gain a witch's power,
translation.fr: On ne peut prendre le pouvoir d'une sorcière

translation.en: she has to give them up voluntarily.
translation.fr: que si elle y renonce d'elle-même.

translation.en: So you do have a choice here.
We can do this the easy way or the hard way.
translation.fr: La méthode simple ou la méthode compliquée.

translation.en: You'll have to kill me first.
So the easy way.
You guys came for me.
There's no I in sisterhood, baby.
There is definitely an I in sisterhood. FRANKIE: You get my meaning.
translation.fr: - Ça rime que dalle. - Tu vois ce que je veux dire.

translation.en: What we were saying was.... We're sorry.
translation.fr: - On voulait te dire... - Qu'on est désolées.

translation.en: We love you, and we unbind you, Lily.
translation.fr: On t'aime, et on libère tes pouvoirs.

translation.en: Guys.
You girls ought to be careful in the woods at night.
translation.fr: C'est pas prudent d'être dans les bois la nuit.

translation.en: A lot of weirdos out here.
We are the weirdos, mister.
You see, Lily, power is order.
translation.fr: Vois-tu, Lily, le pouvoir, c'est l'ordre.

translation.en: It belongs in the hands of those who understand it.
translation.fr: Il appartient à ceux qui le comprennent.

translation.en: It's been that way for thousands of years.
Timmy's a good example of that.
Until you tried to make him in your own image.
translation.fr: Avant que tu ne tentes de le façonner à ton image.

translation.en: So then I had to kill him...
to restore the order.
Because we are not in your image.
translation.fr: Car nous ne sommes pas faits à votre image.

translation.en: We are your rulers and kings.
translation.fr: Nous sommes vos maîtres et vos rois !

translation.en: The thing is, Lily,
you got yourself here.
translation.fr: tout ça, c'est de ta faute.

translation.en: But you're playing with fire,
and I'm gonna watch you burn.
translation.fr: et je vais te regarder brûler.

translation.en: TABBY: South.
LOURDES: East.
FRANKIE: North.
Where do you think you're going?
West.
GIRLS : Air, fire, water, earth.
Air, fire, water, earth.
GIRLS : Fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire, fire.
Now it's your turn to burn.
Big day.
Text us after, okay?
I will.
And take pics.
That I can't promise.
Hey, girls.
Hey, Ms. Schechner. Hi.
How's the warlock dating pool treatin' ya?
translation.fr: Alors, le marché des sorciers célibs ?

translation.en: Are you steering clear?
What? It's too soon?
A little, yeah.
FRANKIE: It's just a joke.
But, also, not really because we almost did die.
translation.fr: Mais pas que, puisqu'on a vraiment failli y passer.

translation.en: We get it.
All right, let's hit the road, baby girl.
Good luck. Thank you.
Hey, you got this.
Love you. Love you.
You ready?
I'm looking for...
And what is your relation?
translation.fr: Vous avez un lien de parenté ?

translation.en: Can I help you?
My name is Lily.
I'm your daughter.
